com.tiggerbiggo.prima.graphics

Class DoubleGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiggerbiggo.prima.graphics.Gradient
      • com.tiggerbiggo.prima.graphics.DoubleGradient

  • public class DoubleGradient
extends Gradient
    Gradient that works with both X and Y components of a vector
